# MenuViewModel.Caption property

Caption of the menu.

```csharp
public string Caption { get; set; }
```

## Exceptions

| exception | condition |
| --- | --- |
| ArgumentNullException | Passed value is null or empty. |

## Remarks

You can use a single `&` in the caption to support Alt-based keyboard navigation.
